result.eng: We drove from Derry to Belfast.
result.ga: thiomáin muid ó dhoire go béal feirste

result.eng: They drove from Belfast to Donegal.

result.orig: thiomáin siad ó bhéal feirste go dún na ngall

result.eng: He drove slowly and carefully. Not without reason, as he was tired.
